title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
sub-title: Learn the fundamentals of AI and machine learning
description: 8-week course covering core AI concepts and applications

details.subtitles: English, Spanish, Portuguese, German, French, Italian, Polish, Dutch
details.content: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to artificial intelligence, covering machine learning algorithms, neural networks, and practical applications. Students will complete hands-on projects using Python and TensorFlow. No prior AI experience required, but basic programming knowledge is recommended.This course provides a comprehensive introduction to artificial intelligence, covering machine learning algorithms, neural networks, and practical applications. Students will complete hands-on projects using Python and TensorFlow. No prior AI experience required, but basic programming knowledge is recommended.

title: Virtual Reality Development with Unity
sub-title: Create immersive VR experiences from scratch

details.content: Learn to develop virtual reality applications using Unity3D and C#. The course covers 3D modeling, interaction design, performance optimization, and publishing to major VR platforms. Students will build a portfolio of VR projects including educational simulations and interactive environments.

title: Blockchain and Smart Contract Programming
sub-title: Master Ethereum development and decentralized applications

details.content: This course teaches blockchain fundamentals, Ethereum architecture, Solidity programming, and smart contract development. Students will learn to build and deploy decentralized applications (DApps) while understanding security best practices and gas optimization techniques.

title: Full-Stack Web Development with React & Node.js
sub-title: Build modern web applications from front to back

details.content: Master the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) through hands-on projects. Learn authentication, API development, state management, and deployment strategies. By the end, you'll have built and deployed a complete portfolio-worthy application.
details.content2: The course includes modern development practices like containerization with Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and performance optimization. You'll also learn testing strategies and agile development methodologies used in professional environments.

title: Data Science Fundamentals with Python
sub-title: Turn data into insights with Python's data science stack

details.content: Learn data analysis, visualization, and machine learning using Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn. Work with real-world datasets to solve business problems and create compelling data stories.
details.content2: The course covers data cleaning techniques, exploratory data analysis, statistical modeling, and an introduction to machine learning algorithms. You'll complete a capstone project analyzing a complex dataset from start to finish.

title: UX/UI Design Masterclass
sub-title: From user research to polished interfaces
description: 6-week intensive design program with portfolio review

details.content: Learn the complete UX design process including user research, wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing. Master Figma and Adobe XD while building a professional design portfolio.
details.content2: The course includes design system creation, micro-interactions, accessibility standards, and how to effectively collaborate with developers. You'll complete 3 real-world design projects with expert feedback.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS
sub-title: Architect scalable solutions on Amazon Web Services
description: 8-week preparation for AWS Solutions Architect certification

details.content: Learn to design and deploy scalable, highly available systems on AWS. Cover EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, CloudFormation, and more while preparing for the AWS Certified Solutions Architect exam.
details.content2: The course includes hands-on labs building multi-tier architectures, implementing security best practices, optimizing costs, and automating deployments. You'll complete a capstone project deploying a production-ready application.

title: Digital Marketing Strategy
sub-title: Data-driven marketing for the digital age

details.content: Master SEO, content marketing, social media, email campaigns, and paid advertising. Learn to analyze metrics and optimize marketing funnels for maximum ROI.
details.content2: The course covers marketing automation tools, customer journey mapping, A/B testing methodologies, and creating data-driven marketing strategies. You'll develop a complete digital marketing plan for a real business case.

title: iOS App Development with SwiftUI
sub-title: Build beautiful apps for Apple platforms

details.content: Learn modern iOS development using SwiftUI, Combine, and Core Data. Build responsive interfaces, integrate APIs, and publish to the App Store while following Apple's Human Interface Guidelines.
details.content2: The course covers advanced topics like in-app purchases, push notifications, Core ML integration, and widget development. You'll complete 3 portfolio-ready apps including one with ARKit capabilities.

details.content: Learn ethical hacking techniques, network security, cryptography, and risk management. Practice penetration testing in controlled environments and learn to secure systems against real-world attacks.
details.content2: The course covers OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities, security compliance standards, incident response procedures, and security auditing. You'll complete hands-on labs simulating enterprise security scenarios.
